Key Match Events: Nick Castellanos hit a walk-off single in the bottom of the ninth to win the game 7-6.
Post-Match Reflections: Phillies manager Rob Thomson praised Nick Castellanos' performance.
Manager Carlos Mendoza commended Mark Vientos for his two-homer game.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Mark Vientos became the first Met to hit multiple homers in a postseason game since 2015.
All five Phillies hitters to start a playoff game on their birthday have recorded at least one hit.
